edu.iu.dsc.tws.rsched.worker

Class WorkerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.rsched.worker.WorkerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IJobMasterFailureListener, IWorkerFailureListener

    public class WorkerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWorkerFailureListener, IJobMasterFailureListener
    Keep information about a managed environment where workers can get restarted.
